<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158288</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158288</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3158</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading-Listening Comprehension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert-Hörendes Erfassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'Lecture-Écoute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão Leitura-Escutando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione Lettura-Ascoltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση-ακούοντας κατανόηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión Lectura-Que escucha</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a guideline for teachers for setting up a reading or listening comprehension activity based on songs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Korrekturlinie für Lehrer für 
einen Messwert oder hörende eine Erfassenaktivität basiert auf 
Lieden aufstellen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une directive pour des professeurs pour 
installer une lecture ou une activité d'écoute de compréhension 
basée sur des chansons</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um guideline para professores para ajustar
acima uma leitura ou uma atividade escutando da compreensão baseada 
em canções</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida di riferimento per gli 
insegnanti per l'installazione una lettura o dell'attività ascoltante
di comprensione basata sulle canzoni</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια οδηγία για τους δασκάλους για την 
οργάνωση μιας δραστηριότητας κατανόησης ανάγνωσης ή ακούσματος 
βασισμένης στα τραγούδια</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía de consulta para los profesores 
para setting-up una lectura o una actividad de la comprensión que 
escucha basada en canciones</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>

version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>

        <educational>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

        <rights>

        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>

        <classification>

              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
